snippet: At Ibiza Tapas Wine Bar, a bright dining room with avant-garde artwork sets the backdrop for tapas dishes that are divided between traditional and modern takes on Spanish finger food.
abstract: Christopher Brooks reviews Ibiza Tapas Wine Bar in Danbury (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: At Ibiza Tapas Wine Bar, a bright dining room with avant-garde artwork sets the backdrop for tapas dishes that are divided between traditional and modern takes on Spanish finger food.

headline.seo: A Review of Ibiza Tapas Wine Bar, in Danbury
headline.main: Tapas That Tease the Eye and the Tongue
